column1: #Text=Ming - Hua says : " Why did n't you ever tell us you could fly ? "
#Text=Zaheer says : " I was n't sure I could .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " I found true freedom .
#Text=I am no longer bound to this earth by worldly desires .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " She sacrificed her life for our cause .
#Text=Now let 's make sure it was n't in vain .
